guild.description:
Humor, irony, exaggeration, or ridicule to expose and criticize people's stupidity or vices, particularly in the context of contemporary politics and other topical issues.

- https://thegloriousamerican.com/

- https://waterfordwhispersnews.com/

title: Pastor's Son By Far the Worst Behaved Kid in Sunday School

author.bio:
| |  | https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/blob/master/ruqqus/helpers/sanitize.py |

author.bio_html:
https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/blob/master/ruqqus/helpers/sanitize.py
_allowed_tags_in_bio
https://github.com/miyuchina/mistletoe

If you can read this you suck.

body: The pastor of the Baptist church I went to Vacation Bible School at was found out to be a philanderer, the wife was a drunk and the son sold pot.
body_html: The pastor of the Baptist church I went to Vacation Bible School at was found out to be a philanderer, the wife was a drunk and the son sold pot.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: That's often the case at the stiff-necked churches. People want to cover up their problems, so they must look as pious as possible so no one finds them out.
body_html: That's often the case at the stiff-necked churches. People want to cover up their problems, so they must look as pious as possible so no one finds them out.
